formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A LENGTH ERROR occurs with the following message:

listitem.screen: ParseExpr[8] e←((~∨\p)⌿⍵)⍪⊃⍪/n⍪¨p⊂[0]⍵ ⍝ Add an expr node for literal groups

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The expression above fails to consider the possibility of an empty vector returned by p⊂[0]⍵ and it also does not properly enclose the n value. We also need to deal with the possibility of an empty vector to ⊃⍪/ and so we need to attach a ⊂MtAST to the front (or back). This fixes these errors.
